thread.title: Birmingham McDonald's manager parks in disabled bay
thread.title_full: Birmingham McDonald's manager parks in disabled bay

title: Birmingham McDonald's manager parks in disabled bay
text: show ad Mother taking her dementia-hit grandmother, 84, to McDonald's is stunned to find disabled parking bay is being used by restaurant's able-bodied OWNER Stella Weston, 36, a mother-of-five, had approached a driver who was parking in the only remaining disabled space to ask if her grandmother, 84, could use it However she allegedly then received an 'earful' from McDonald's store manager Afia Sirkhot claims she didn't realise it was a disabled bay as sign was blocked She claims she would have moved sooner if Ms Weston had not been abusive
